content: While you’ve technically traveled through most of Windrest at this point, there’s still one last section across another stone bridge. Like before, it’s guarded by another Spearbone, along with a few Withered Corpses and a Blazebone shooting projectiles from the far side of the bridge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windrest Hamlet'.
The content is as follows:
While you’ve technically traveled through most of Windrest at this point, there’s still one last section across another stone bridge. Like before, it’s guarded by another Spearbone, along with a few Withered Corpses and a Blazebone shooting projectiles from the far side of the bridge.
